column1: Powerlifting RAW Best Lifter: Layne Norton
Powerlifting Best Lifter with Gear: Joe McNeil
Powerlifting Female Best Lifter:  Jenna Singel
Bench Press RAW Best Lifter: Dave Leslie
Bench Press Best Lifter with Gear: Ron Grey
Special thanks to Bryan Hoffman and the folks at Hoffman's Barbell Club for putting on an outstanding event.  This event was outdoors and held in
conjunction with a custom car and motorycle show.  The event drew thousands of spectators throughout the day which gave the lifters a lot of
motivation to put up the big numbers.  The event will be held the same weekend next year so get ready to see some great lifting and some awesome
custom cars and motorcycles ;when your not lifting.
